section.name: Welcome to Citrus
section.p: Citrus is an integration testing framework written in Java that tests your software application to fit into your customer's environment. The tool can easily simulate surrounding systems across various transports (e.g. Http, JMS, TCP/IP, SOAP, ...) in order to perform automatic end-to-end use case testing.

Citrus aims to
automate the integration testing for applications
easily simulate interface partners supporting a wide range of protocols
perform fully qualified use case end-to-end tests
provide high test coverage for your software application

section.name: Technologies
section.p:
Citrus uses following technologies
Spring 2.5.x as the glue for everything
TestNG runs Citrus tests
SLF4J for logging
Maven as build tool with support for multi module projects
Bamboo as build management tool for continuous integration
